revision.text:
'''Les Régions''' sont des zones du monde Pokémon. Chaque nouvelle région introduit son lot de [[Route Statistics|routes]], de [[Towns & Cities|villes]], d'[[Gyms|arènes]] et de [[Obtainable Pokémon|Pokémon]]. Les Pokémons étrangers à une région y obtiennent un malus de dégâts, mais chaque nouvelle région visitée réduit ce malus de 10%. De plus, certaines régions offrent des mécaniques de gameplay uniques. ===[[Kanto]]=== Kanto est la première région du jeu et permet au joueur d'apprendre les mécaniques de gameplay principales. On y trouve 151 Pokémon uniques à attraper et élever. Petit à petit, le joueur découvrira le fonctionnement de la [[Pokemon Day Care|reproduction]] des Pokémon, déterrera des objets dans les [[Underground|Souterrains]], plantera des [[Berries|baies]] à la [[Farm|Ferme]], accomplira des [[Quests|Quêtes]] et apprendra à se servir des [[Oak Items|Objets de Chen]] et des [[Gems|Joyaux]] et débloquera des [[Achievements|Succès]].
En donnant des [[Protein|Protéines]] à ses Pokémon, la quantité de dégâts ajoutés par cycles de reproduction augmentera. Les Protéines peuvent être obtenues vers la fin de l'aventure, au [[Shops#Kanto: Locations & Items|Plateau Indigo]].
Une fonctionnalité exclusive à la région de Kanto est le [[Safari Zone|Parc Safari]], où le joueur pourra bouger librement et attraper des Pokémons en se servant de pierres permettant d'augmenter leur taux de capture et d'appâts réduisant le risque qu'ils prennent la fuite.
'''Malus de dégâts appliqué aux Pokémon étrangers: 90%'''
'''Nombre maximum de Protéines pouvant être données à un Pokémon: 5''' ===[[Johto]]===
Johto is the second region where the player can catch another 107 new Pokémon. The newly introduced feature in this region is the breeding queue.
This is the first region where the damage debuff becomes noticeable. Any non-native Pokémon receives a damage debuff based on the number of discovered regions. Each discovered and visited region including Kanto decreases the debuff by 10%. E.g. if the overall damage of the Pokémon was 10,000 in Kanto, it will decrease to 2,000 in Johto. Pokémon that are native to Johto deal 100% of their damage in Johto. Upon moving to Kanto via the [[Dock]], it is vice versa. Johto-native Pokémon deal only 20% of their damage in Kanto, while the Kanto-native Pokémon deal 100% in their native region.
The breeding queue allows the player to queue up 4 Pokémon besides the 4 currently breeding eggs. As soon as the Pokémon are queued up, their damage is no longer added to the overall damage of the team until they are either bred and hatched or otherwise removed from the queue.
In Johto the player has the opportunity to get another Oak item to boost the farm.
'''Damage debuff of non-native Pokémon: 80%'''
'''Breeding Queue in the hatchery: 4'''
'''Maximum Protein per Pokémon: 10'''
===[[Hoenn]]===
Hoenn is the third region and the player can catch another 141 unique Pokèmon here. The player will find the last missing Oak item here and can take the challenge of the [[Battle Frontier|Battle Frontier]]. There is also a Pokémon that evolves based on the current weather here.
In the Battle Frontier the player can take a challenge and win great prizes, including 4 unique Pokémon. It is not necessary for the progression to Sinnoh to capture these Pokémon from the Battle Frontier. To reach the last prize at stage 386 the player should have a minimum of 1,000,000 attack damage including all [[Gems|gems]] at maximum. Manual clicks are not possible in the Battle Frontier.
'''Damage debuff of non-native Pokémon: 70%'''
'''Breeding Queue in the hatchery: 8'''
'''Maximum Protein per Pokémon: 15'''
===[[Sinnoh]]===
Sinnoh is the fourth region and 120 new Pokémon are waiting to be caught. The player will encounter some Pokémon that only evolve when they are in a certain area. One should pay attention to the hints from the local people. At this stage it is suggested to give maximum [[Protein|protein]] at least to the Pokémon that are actively being bred.
'''Damage debuff of non-native Pokémon: 60%'''
'''Breeding Queue in the hatchery: 16'''
'''Maximum Protein per Pokémon: 20'''
===[[Unova]]===
Unova is the fifth region with 165 new Pokémon to catch. There are lots of dungeons in this region that require a substantial amount of Dungeon Tokens as well as damage. Breeding and hatching Pokémon that are native to this region for several days is quite common at this stage.
'''Damage debuff of non-native Pokémon: 50%'''
'''Breeding Queue in the hatchery: 32'''
'''Maximum Protein per Pokémon: 25'''
===[[Kalos]]===
Kalos is the sixth region and currently has 78 new Pokémon to catch, breed and hatch. Some currently unobtainable forms will be added in the future. Kalos' gyms and dungeons are quite tough but offer great rewards as well. At this stage it should be easily possible for the player to give every Pokémon the maximum amount of protein.
'''Damage debuff of non-native Pokémon: 40%'''
'''Breeding Queue in the hatchery: 64'''
'''Maximum Protein per Pokémon: 30'''
===[[Alola]]===
Alola is the seventh region and currently has 125 new Pokémon to catch, breed and hatch. Some currently unobtainable Pokémons will be added in the future. Alola' gyms and dungeons are quite tough but offer great rewards as well. At this stage it should be easily possible for the player to give every Pokémon the maximum amount of protein.
'''Damage debuff of non-native Pokémon: 30%'''
'''Breeding Queue in the hatchery: 96'''
'''Maximum Protein per Pokémon: 35'''
===[[Galar]]===
La région de Galar sera ajoutée dans une future mise à jour. [[Category:Regions]]

'''Les Régions''' sont des zones du monde Pokémon. Les Pokémons étrangers à une région y obtiennent un malus de dégâts, mais chaque nouvelle région visitée réduit ce malus de 10%. De plus, certaines régions offrent des mécaniques de gameplay uniques. ===[[Kanto]]=== Kanto est la première région du jeu et permet au joueur d'apprendre les mécaniques de gameplay principales. Une fonctionnalité exclusive à la région de Kanto est le [[Safari Zone|Parc Safari]], où le joueur pourra bouger librement et attraper des Pokémons en se servant de pierres permettant d'augmenter leur taux de capture et d'appâts réduisant le risque qu'ils prennent la fuite.

Each discovered and visited region including Kanto decreases the debuff by 10%. E.g. if the overall damage of the Pokémon was 10,000 in Kanto, it will decrease to 2,000 in Johto. To reach the last prize at stage 386 the player should have a minimum of 1,000,000 attack damage including all [[Gems|gems]] at maximum. Manual clicks are not possible in the Battle Frontier.

'''Breeding Queue in the hatchery: 8'''
'''Maximum Protein per Pokémon: 15'''

Sinnoh is the fourth region and 120 new Pokémon are waiting to be caught. The player will encounter some Pokémon that only evolve when they are in a certain area. One should pay attention to the hints from the local people. At this stage it is suggested to give maximum [[Protein|protein]] at least to the Pokémon that are actively being bred.
'''Damage debuff of non-native Pokémon: 60%'''
'''Breeding Queue in the hatchery: 16'''
'''Maximum Protein per Pokémon: 20'''
===[[Unova]]===
Unova is the fifth region with 165 new Pokémon to catch. There are lots of dungeons in this region that require a substantial amount of Dungeon Tokens as well as damage. Breeding and hatching Pokémon that are native to this region for several days is quite common at this stage.
'''Damage debuff of non-native Pokémon: 50%'''
'''Breeding Queue in the hatchery: 32'''
'''Maximum Protein per Pokémon: 25'''
===[[Kalos]]===
Kalos is the sixth region and currently has 78 new Pokémon to catch, breed and hatch. Some currently unobtainable forms will be added in the future. Kalos' gyms and dungeons are quite tough but offer great rewards as well. At this stage it should be easily possible for the player to give every Pokémon the maximum amount of protein.
'''Damage debuff of non-native Pokémon: 40%'''
'''Breeding Queue in the hatchery: 64'''
'''Maximum Protein per Pokémon: 30'''
===[[Alola]]===
Alola is the seventh region and currently has 125 new Pokémon to catch, breed and hatch. Some currently unobtainable Pokémons will be added in the future. Alola' gyms and dungeons are quite tough but offer great rewards as well. At this stage it should be easily possible for the player to give every Pokémon the maximum amount of protein.
'''Damage debuff of non-native Pokémon: 30%'''
'''Breeding Queue in the hatchery: 96'''

La région de Galar sera ajoutée dans une future mise à jour. [[Category:Regions]]

revision.text:
'''Les Régions''' sont des zones du monde Pokémon. Chaque nouvelle région introduit son lot de [[Route Statistics|routes]], de [[Towns & Cities|villes]], d'[[Gyms|arènes]] et de [[Obtainable Pokémon|Pokémon]]. Les Pokémons étrangers à une région y obtiennent un malus de dégâts, mais chaque nouvelle région visitée réduit ce malus de 10%. De plus, certaines régions offrent des mécaniques de gameplay uniques. ===[[Kanto]]=== Kanto est la première région du jeu et permet au joueur d'apprendre les mécaniques de gameplay principales. On y trouve 151 Pokémon uniques à attraper et élever. A unique feature in Kanto is the [[Safari Zone]], where the player can freely move and catch Pokémon with the support of throwing rocks increase the capture chance and feeding bait to decrease the fleeing chance of encountered Pokémon.
'''Damage debuff of non-native Pokémon: 90%'''
'''Maximum Protein per Pokémon: 5'''
===[[Johto]]===
Johto is the second region where the player can catch another 107 new Pokémon. The newly introduced feature in this region is the breeding queue.

The breeding queue allows the player to queue up 4 Pokémon besides the 4 currently breeding eggs. As soon as the Pokémon are queued up, their damage is no longer added to the overall damage of the team until they are either bred and hatched or otherwise removed from the queue.
In Johto the player has the opportunity to get another Oak item to boost the farm.

In the Battle Frontier the player can take a challenge and win great prizes, including 4 unique Pokémon. It is not necessary for the progression to Sinnoh to capture these Pokémon from the Battle Frontier. To reach the last prize at stage 386 the player should have a minimum of 1,000,000 attack damage including all [[Gems|gems]] at maximum. Manual clicks are not possible in the Battle Frontier.
'''Damage debuff of non-native Pokémon: 70%'''
'''Breeding Queue in the hatchery: 8'''
'''Maximum Protein per Pokémon: 15'''
===[[Sinnoh]]===
Sinnoh is the fourth region and 120 new Pokémon are waiting to be caught. The player will encounter some Pokémon that only evolve when they are in a certain area. One should pay attention to the hints from the local people. At this stage it is suggested to give maximum [[Protein|protein]] at least to the Pokémon that are actively being bred.
'''Damage debuff of non-native Pokémon: 60%'''
'''Breeding Queue in the hatchery: 16'''
'''Maximum Protein per Pokémon: 20'''
===[[Unova]]===
Unova is the fifth region with 165 new Pokémon to catch. There are lots of dungeons in this region that require a substantial amount of Dungeon Tokens as well as damage. Breeding and hatching Pokémon that are native to this region for several days is quite common at this stage.
'''Damage debuff of non-native Pokémon: 50%'''
'''Breeding Queue in the hatchery: 32'''
'''Maximum Protein per Pokémon: 25'''
===[[Kalos]]===
Kalos is the sixth region and currently has 78 new Pokémon to catch, breed and hatch. Some currently unobtainable forms will be added in the future. Kalos' gyms and dungeons are quite tough but offer great rewards as well. At this stage it should be easily possible for the player to give every Pokémon the maximum amount of protein.
'''Damage debuff of non-native Pokémon: 40%'''
'''Breeding Queue in the hatchery: 64'''
'''Maximum Protein per Pokémon: 30'''
===[[Alola]]===
Alola is the seventh region and currently has 125 new Pokémon to catch, breed and hatch. Some currently unobtainable Pokémons will be added in the future. Alola' gyms and dungeons are quite tough but offer great rewards as well. At this stage it should be easily possible for the player to give every Pokémon the maximum amount of protein.
'''Damage debuff of non-native Pokémon: 30%'''
'''Breeding Queue in the hatchery: 96'''
'''Maximum Protein per Pokémon: 35'''

La région de Galar sera ajoutée dans une future mise à jour. [[Category:Regions]]
